content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[WikidataImport] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'rawimport/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [wd],
        FILE_FORMAT = [parquetsimple]
) AS
select
  "id"
  ,"type"
  ,"datatype" varchar(100)
  ,CAST("labels" as nvarchar(max)) AS "labels"
  ,CAST("descriptions" as nvarchar(max)) AS "descriptions"
  ,CAST("aliases" as nvarchar(max)) AS "aliases"
  ,CAST("claims" as nvarchar(max)) AS "claims"
  ,CAST("sitelinks" nvarchar(max)) AS "sitelinks"
  ,"lastrevid"
from openrowset(
        bulk 'latest-all.json',
        data_source = 'wd',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
     cross apply openjson((CASE WHEN doc='[' OR doc=']' THEN NULL ELSE doc END))
        with(
                "id" varchar(100)
                ,"type" varchar(50)
                ,"datatype" varchar(100)
                ,"labels" nvarchar(max) AS JSON
                ,"descriptions" nvarchar(max) AS JSON
                ,"aliases" nvarchar(max) AS JSON
                ,"claims" nvarchar(max) AS JSON
                ,"sitelinks" nvarchar(max) AS JSON
                ,"lastrevid" decimal(28,0)
        )
